product_description: a kettle with half grey and half silver with grey lid used for serving hot tea with a C shaped handle for convenient usage.

copy_data.primary_copy: Elevate your tea moments with our sleek dual-tone kettle. Perfect pours, comfortable grip, timeless style. Your daily ritual awaits.
copy_data.headline: The Perfect Pour, Every Time
copy_data.description: Blend modern elegance with practical comfort. Our ergonomic C-handle kettle brings style to your tea service while ensuring controlled, drip-free pouring.

claude_optimized_prompt: A modern minimalist kitchen scene with soft morning light, featuring a sleek half-grey half-silver kettle on a light marble countertop, steam rising elegantly, surrounded by subtle tea elements. Shallow depth of field, professional product photography style, rule of thirds composition, bright and airy aesthetic

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A modern minimalist kitchen scene with a bright and airy aesthetic, illuminated by soft morning light. In the foreground, a sleek half-grey half-silver kettle sits on a light marble countertop, with steam rising gracefully from its spout. Surrounding the kettle are subtle tea elements, such as a small dish with tea leaves and a simple ceramic teacup. The background is softly blurred, using a shallow depth of field to enhance the focus on the kettle and its details. The composition is based on the rule of thirds, evoking a professional product photography style that emphasizes clean lines and contemporary design.
